description: Office locations (city, country, territory) and office codes used by employees.
Employee directory with reporting hierarchy (reportsTo), office assignment, and job titles.
Customer accounts, contacts, location, sales rep employee number, and credit limit.
Product line categories (e.g., Motorcycles, Classic Cars).
Product catalog with product line, stock quantity, buy price and MSRP.
Customer orders with dates and status.
Line items for each order (product, quantity, price each).
Customer payments with dates and amounts.
